results.title: Simvastatin monotherapy as a potential option for statin-associated muscle symptoms: a case report.
results.text_hl: We report on a case of statin-associated @<m>DISEASE_Muscular_Atrophy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009133 @@@muscle damage@@@ that was successfully managed by simplifying the @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@'s combination therapy with @<m>CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe_Simvastatin_Drug_Combination</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069499 @@@simvastatin-ezetimibe@@@ to @CHEMICAL_Simvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ alone.

citations.NLM: Qu H, Guo M, Kou N, Wu HT, Zhang Y, Gao ZY, Shi DZ. Simvastatin monotherapy as a potential option for statin-associated muscle symptoms: a case report. J Clin Pharm Ther. 2016 Oct;41(5):568-71. PMID: 27425755
